channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-4601|2024-08-04T19:40:47.623Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 6.02, 6.06, and 6.0.6.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from a stack trace that could aid in further attacks against the system.

item.title: CVE-2020-4857|2024-08-04T08:14:59.406Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 190460.

item.title: CVE-2019-4603|2024-08-04T19:40:48.442Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 6.02, 6.06, and 6.0.6.1 could allow an authenticated user to create keywords through the REST API and have them appear as if they were created by another user. IBM X-Force ID: 168295.

item.title: CVE-2020-4863|2024-08-04T08:14:59.185Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 190566.

item.title: CVE-2020-4977|2024-08-04T08:22:07.551Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 192470.

item.title: CVE-2019-4602|2024-08-04T19:40:48.505Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 6.02, 6.06, and 6.0.6.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 168293.
